sentences.chinese: 其明年，齊人少翁以鬼神方見上。
sentences.literal: Next year, man from Qi Shaojun with ghosts spirits methods appeared before emperor.

sentences.chinese: 上有所幸王夫人，夫人卒，少翁以方術蓋夜致王夫人及灶鬼之貌云，天子自帷中望見焉。
sentences.literal: Emperor favored Lady Wang, lady died, Shaojun used recipes secretly at night brought Lady Wang and stove ghost's appearance, it is said, Son of Heaven from within curtains saw them.

sentences.chinese: 於是乃拜少翁為文成將軍，賞賜甚多，以客禮禮之。
sentences.literal: Thereupon appointed Shaojun as General Wencheng, bestowed rewards very many, treated with guest rituals.

sentences.chinese: 文成言曰：「上即欲與神通，宮室被服不象神，神物不至。」
sentences.literal: Wencheng said: "Emperor wishes communicate with spirits, palace chambers clothing do not resemble gods, divine things will not come."

sentences.chinese: 乃作畫雲氣車，及各以勝日駕車辟惡鬼。
sentences.literal: Made painted cloud-qi chariots, each used victory days drove chariots warded off evil spirits.

sentences.chinese: 又作甘泉宮，中為臺室，畫天、地、泰一諸神，而置祭具以致天神。
sentences.literal: Also built Ganquan Palace, center made terrace chambers, painted Heaven Earth Taiyi various gods, placed sacrificial implements to summon heavenly gods.

sentences.chinese: 居歲餘，其方益衰，神不至。
sentences.literal: After residing over year, his recipes increasingly declined, spirits did not come.

sentences.chinese: 乃為帛書以飯牛，詳弗知也，言此牛腹中有奇。
sentences.literal: Made silk book to feed ox, pretended not to know, said this ox belly had something strange.

sentences.chinese: 殺而視之，得書，書言其怪，天子疑之。
sentences.literal: Killed examined it, obtained book, book spoke of its strangeness, Son of Heaven doubted it.

sentences.chinese: 有識其手書，問之人，果（為）［偽］書。
sentences.literal: Someone recognized his handwriting, questioned person, indeed forged book.

sentences.chinese: 於是誅文成將軍而隱之。
sentences.literal: Thereupon executed General Wencheng but concealed it.

sentences.chinese: 其後則又作柏梁、銅柱、承露僊人掌之屬矣。
sentences.literal: Afterwards then also made Cypress Beam, Bronze Pillar, Dew-Catching Immortal figures and like.

sentences.chinese: 文成死明年，天子病鼎湖甚，巫醫無所不致，（至）不愈。
sentences.literal: Year after Wencheng died, Son of Heaven gravely ill at Dinghu, witches physicians employed without limit, did not recover.

sentences.chinese: 游水發根乃言曰：「上郡有巫，病而鬼下之。」
sentences.literal: You Shui Fagen then said: "Shangjun has witch, when ill spirits descend upon her."
Emperor summoned placed shrine at Ganquan.
